title: NoSuchMethodException: io.quarkus.deployment.CodeGenerator.initAndRun
body:
### Describe the bug

Hi, quakus dev team,

I faced the problem during the migration from 2.13.1 to 2.13.3 and the newest version such as 2.14.1 and 3.0.0 Alpha.
The problem could not be reproduced on 2.13.1 but reproduced on 2.13.3.

The sources could be found there:
https://github.com/fragaLY/performance-researches/tree/master/quarkus-reactive

### Expected behavior

Image is builded

### Actual behavior

```
* Exception is:
```

### How to Reproduce?

Steps to reproduce:
1. clode https://github.com/fragaLY/performance-researches/tree/master/quarkus-reactive
2. run ./gradlew build

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

17.0.5-amzn

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

java: 22.3.r17-grl

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.13.3, 2.14.1, 3.0.0Alpha

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

gradle 7.6

### Additional information

_No response_
